title: Skill Frontmatter Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating skill frontmatter in SKILL.md files

description.description: Precise description including 'Trigger:' clause for when AI should invoke

input.description: Optional: Expected input format as 'description | data_type'

output.description: Optional: Expected output format as 'description | data_type'

skills.description: Optional: List of internal skill dependencies

dependencies.description: Optional: External libraries with version ranges

allowed-tools.description: Optional: Tools agent can use with this skill
